name: Elyrian Lyre
description: An ancient instrument adorned with intricate patterns that seem to shift and change color in harmony with the light. Its strings emit a soft, ethereal music that resonates deep within one's soul.

name: Harmonic Key
description: A delicate crystal key that, when used in conjunction with the Whispering Harmony music box from the Chamber of Echoing Memories, reveals a hidden resonance within the Lyre itself. The key glows softly in harmony with the music, as if attuning itself to the harmonics of the instrument.
